title: North Queensland Volcanic National Park Cabin Retreat with Daily Bush Breakfast, Sunset Wildlife & Lava Tubes Tours
description:
Welcome to Discovery Resorts - Undara, the ultimate outback escape with a side of spellbinding natural wonder. Around the corner are 190,000-year-old lava tubes, so jump on the guided tour and wander through these ancient underground tunnels, your ticket to a geological marvel that has been millions of years in the making.

After exploring, take it easy on the sunset wildlife tour with a glass of bubbles in hand as the sun dips over the savannah and local wildlife comes alive, from hopping kangaroos to microbats soaring out of the caves. Whether you're cooling off in the pool, grabbing a feed at the Iron Pot Bistro or spending an evening by the campfire, this is an outback adventure with a side of pure Aussie charm.
offer_address: Undara Experience, Undara Road, Mount Surprise, Queensland 4871, Australia
